long_description: The Salomon Faction Boa snowboard boots wrap your feet in comfort for all-day shred sessions on the slopes. At this price, you won't want to miss out on these boots! Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Thermal formable Feel Good liners conform to feet after several days of riding, and are crafted with a wide range of foams to fit specific flex zones on feet and ankles. Preshaped footbeds provide foot stabilization and arch support for improved pressure distribution; antimicrobial finish helps keep odors at bay. Speed Powerlace system is a quick, 1-pull tightener that won't burn your fingers; it provides a supportive, personalized fit with natural flex and feel. Salomon Faction Boa boots with stomp outsoles protect you on bomb drops and unexpected cement landings; plus, they offer good board feel and response.
